{{Infobox football tournament season | title = Copa del Rey | year = 1923 | other_title = | image = | imagesize = | caption = | country = Spain | num_teams = 8 | defending champions = | champions = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | runner-up = [[CE Europa|Europa]] | matches = 15 | goals = 46 | top goal scorer = | player = | prevseason = [[1922 Copa del Rey|1922]] | nextseason = [[1924 Copa del Rey|1924]] }} The '''Copa del Rey 1923''' (known at that time as '''King [[Alfonso XIII]]'s Cup''') was the 21st edition of the [[Copa del Rey]]. The competition started on March 25, 1923 and concluded on May 13, 1923 with the Final, held at the [[Camp de Les Corts|Les Corts]] in [[Barcelona]], in which [[Athletic Bilbao]] lifted the trophy for the 9th time ever with a 1â0 victory over [[CE Europa|CD Europa]]. ==Teams== * '''[[Biscay]]''': [[Athletic Bilbao]] *'''[[Gipuzkoa]]''': [[Real Sociedad]] * '''Center Region''': [[Real Madrid]] * '''South Region''': [[Sevilla FC]] *'''[[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]]''': [[Real Vigo Sporting|Real Vigo]] *'''[[Asturias]]''': [[Sporting de GijÃ³n]] * '''[[Catalonia]]''': [[CE Europa]] *'''[[Levante, Spain|Levante]]''': [[Valencia CF|Valencia FC]] ==Quarterfinals== '''First leg:''' {| width=100% cellspacing=1 !width=20%| !width=12%| !width=20%| ! |- |April 22, 1923 |- style=font-size:90% |align=right|[[Real Sociedad]] |align=center|'''0â0''' |align=left|[[Athletic Bilbao]] |- style=font-size:90% |align=right|[[CE Europa|CD Europa]] |align=center|'''3â2''' |align=left|[[Sporting Gijon]] |- |'''Second leg:''' |- |April 29, 1923 |- style=font-size:90% |align=right|'''[[Athletic Bilbao]]''' |align=center|'''2â0''' |align=left|[[Real Sociedad]] |agg:2â0 |- style=font-size:90% |align=right|[[Sporting Gijon]] |align=center|'''1â2''' |align=left|'''[[CE Europa|CD Europa]]''' |agg:3â5 |} ==Final== {{main|1923 Copa del Rey Final}} {{footballbox| date= 13 May 1923| team1= [[Athletic Bilbao]] | score= 1 â 0 | report= | team2= [[CE Europa|CD Europa]] | goals1= Travieso| goals2= | stadium=[[Camp de Les Corts|Les Corts]], [[Barcelona]] | attendance= 30,000| referee= Rasero}} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- ![[Copa del Rey]] 1923 winners |- |'''[[Athletic Bilbao]]'''
